languages.text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: Chainsaws deal several strikes per any attacks, if first strike hit target all last strikes automatically hits target, if first strike was dodged or parried by target all last strikes automatically will be dodged or parried.

Each attack of this chainsaw deals several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

Each attack of this chainsaw deals several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

Each attack with this chainsaw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

Each attack with this chainsaw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

languages.text: Cada ataque de esta sierra pesada de roca inflige varios golpes. Si el primer golpe impacta al objetivo, los golpes subsiguientes impactan automáticamente. Si el golpe es esquivado o parado, los golpes subsiguientes se esquivan o paran automáticamente.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: Cada ataque de esta sierra pesada de roca inflige varios golpes. Si el primer golpe impacta al objetivo, los golpes subsiguientes impactan automáticamente. Si el golpe es esquivado o parado, los golpes subsiguientes se esquivan o paran automáticamente.

languages.text: ヘヴィロックソーでの攻撃は、それぞれ複数回攻撃する。最初の攻撃がターゲットに当たった場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に命中する。最初の攻撃が回避または受け流された場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に回避または受け流される。
languages.original_text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: ヘヴィロックソーでの攻撃は、それぞれ複数回攻撃する。最初の攻撃がターゲットに当たった場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に命中する。最初の攻撃が回避または受け流された場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に回避または受け流される。

languages.text: 使用这把重型岩锯攻击敌人时，会触发多次攻击。如果第一次攻击命中了目标，则后续所有攻击都会命中目标。如果第一次攻击被目标闪避或招架，则后续所有攻击都会被闪避或招架。
languages.original_text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: 使用这把重型岩锯攻击敌人时，会触发多次攻击。如果第一次攻击命中了目标，则后续所有攻击都会命中目标。如果第一次攻击被目标闪避或招架，则后续所有攻击都会被闪避或招架。

languages.text: Jeder Angriff mit dieser schweren Felssäge führt mehrere Hiebe aus. Trifft der erste Hieb das Ziel, treffen alle folgenden Hiebe automatisch. Wenn das Ziel dem ersten Hieb ausweicht oder diesen pariert, gilt dies automatisch auch für alle folgenden Hiebe.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Angriff mit dieser schweren Felssäge führt mehrere Hiebe aus. Trifft der erste Hieb das Ziel, treffen alle folgenden Hiebe automatisch. Wenn das Ziel dem ersten Hieb ausweicht oder diesen pariert, gilt dies automatisch auch für alle folgenden Hiebe.

languages.text: Chaque attaque réalisée avec cette disqueuse lourde porte plusieurs coups. Si le premier coup touche la cible, tous les coups suivants la touchent automatiquement. À l'inverse, si le premier coup est esquivé ou paré, il en est de même pour tous les coups suivants.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: Chaque attaque réalisée avec cette disqueuse lourde porte plusieurs coups. Si le premier coup touche la cible, tous les coups suivants la touchent automatiquement. À l'inverse, si le premier coup est esquivé ou paré, il en est de même pour tous les coups suivants.

languages.text: Каждая атака этой камнерезкой включает несколько ударов. Если первый удар достигает цели, то и последующие тоже. Если цель уклоняется от первого удара или парирует его, с последующими ударами происходит то же самое.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this chainsaw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

traits.locale_text: Каждая атака этой цепной пилой включает несколько ударов. Если первый удар достигает цели, то и последующие тоже. Если цель уклоняется от первого удара или парирует его, с последующими ударами происходит то же самое.
